sentences.en: A cheer went up from the other passengers.
sentences.cn: 其他乘客发出一阵欢呼声。

sentences.en: A deafening cheer went up from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 人群中爆发出震耳欲聋的欢呼声.

sentences.en: A good meal brought cheer to our hearts.
sentences.cn: 一顿美餐使我们心中愉快.

sentences.en: A great cheer went up from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 观众爆发出一阵热烈的欢呼声。

sentences.en: A timely bingo win brought some cheer to Juliet Little's family yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天玩宾戈赢了一把，适时地给朱丽叶·利特尔一家带来些许的欢快心情。

sentences.en: All the guests enjoy good cheer.
sentences.cn: 所有来宾尽情享受美酒佳肴.

sentences.en: Cheer up, better times may be ahead.
sentences.cn: 打起精神来，好日子也许还在后头呢。

sentences.en: Cheer up! It can't be as bad as all that.
sentences.cn: 振作起来! 情况不会那么糟.

sentences.en: Everybody cheered when the firemen arrived.
sentences.cn: 消防员到达时，大家都欢呼起来。

sentences.en: From the people, a cheer rose up.
sentences.cn: 人群中传出了一阵欢呼声。

sentences.en: I can always count on you to cheer me up.
sentences.cn: 你总能使我振作起来。

sentences.en: I know the very thing to cheer you up.
sentences.cn: 我知道什么能让你提起精神。

sentences.en: I wrote that song just to cheer myself up.
sentences.cn: 我写那首歌是给我自己打气的。

sentences.en: larger companies gave at least two cheers for the Budget.
sentences.cn: 大公司们对年度财政报告表现出有保留的赞同。

sentences.en: So let’s give a cheer to the kids who passed their exams.
sentences.cn: 那么我们为通过考试的孩子们欢呼吧。

sentences.en: The audience rose bodily to cheer the hero.
sentences.cn: 听众全体起立向那位英雄欢呼致意.

sentences.en: The audience was shouting and cheering.
sentences.cn: 观众在呐喊欢呼。

sentences.en: The colonel was rewarded with a resounding cheer from the men.
sentences.cn: 士兵对上校报以震天的欢呼声。

sentences.en: The final whistle was greeted with triumphant cheers from players and spectators.
sentences.cn: 终场的哨声迎来了运动员和观众胜利的欢呼。

sentences.en: The spectators cheered him wildly.
sentences.cn: 观众拼命为他加油。

sentences.en: They were impressed by his steadfast good cheer.
sentences.cn: 他整天笑呵呵的样子给他们留下很深的印象。

sentences.en: three cheers for the winners!.
sentences.cn: 为获胜者欢呼三声！。

words.tran_cn: 高兴地，兴高采烈地；快活地
欢呼者；用欢呼声激励者

phrases.tran_cn: 使高兴；高兴起来；使振奋
让你振作起来，让你开心起来；让你舒畅些
（表达赞赏或祝贺的）三声欢呼
有保留的赞同；一定程度的积极性

trans.tran_en: a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement
a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement
a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement
to shout as a way of showing happiness, praise, approval, or support of someone or something
